ygData.subject: Re: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh hello there, yes I remember you. How have you been doing? Alas I am struggling in level 27, I ve been at 27 for days and have failed to get above 1 bubble
ygData.messageBody:
Oh hello there, yes I remember you.

How have you been doing?

Alas I am struggling in level 27, I've been at 27 for days and have failed
to get above 1 bubble of exp, then last night I thought I'd help the cause
and die a few times, back to 26. Oh well, I got back to 27 later that
evening.

I hope your doing better than I am.

Madagan, Bard of 27 songs - Veeshan




silky@... on 05/11/99 17:59:54

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hello




From: silky@...



Welcome Madagan.

Remember that irritating bard in MM the other day that kept trying to
educate you on the beauties of Lullaby on train stopping?

Raises hand, yup...was me.



At 10:33 AM 11/5/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: John_Senior@...
>
>Hello everyone, I am a Bard and I play on Veeshan server.
>My character is called Madagan Sonweaver and he is currently level 27.
>Anyone else on this list play on Veeshan, I am currently killing Horrid
>Dark Elves in Mistmoore.
>
>
>
>
>
>eqbards-owner@onelist.com on 05/11/99 10:25:01
>
>Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
>To: John Senior/M&G
>cc:
>Subject: [eqbards] Welcome to eqbards@onelist.com
>
>
>
>
>Ho and well met fellow travellers and bards alike. I hope we can make
this
>a
>meaningful moderation. feel free to announce your comments for the good
of
>all.
>
>
>
>Thank you,
>Torenithus Legendmaker
>Bard of Qeynos
